text: Doggystyle is a gangsta rap album by Snoop Dogg (then known as Snoop Doggy Dogg). The album was recorded not long after The Chronic (1992). Doggystyle was praised by critics for lyrical "realism". This album was released on November 23, 1993. It premiered at #1 on the Billboard 200 albums chart.
